title: Understanding Electronic Transitions
text: Consider which type of spectroscopy is used to study the absorption of light that causes electrons to move to higher energy levels.

title: Identifying the Spectroscopy Type
text: Which type of spectroscopy is primarily used to study electronic transitions in molecules?

title: Vibrational Transitions
text: Think about which spectroscopy technique is used to study the vibrations of molecules.

title: Identifying Vibrational Spectroscopy
text: Which type of spectroscopy is primarily used to study vibrational transitions in molecules?

title: Applications of $$ \cup \frac{V}{Vis}$$ Spectroscopy
text: Consider the applications of $$ \cup \frac{V}{Vis}$$ spectroscopy in determining the concentration of solutions and studying conjugated systems.

title: Applications of IR Spectroscopy
text: Think about how IR spectroscopy is used to identify functional groups in organic compounds.
